definition: preventing or contributing to the prevention of disease, an agent or device intended to prevent conception
details:
adjective
- preventing or contributing to the prevention of disease
= example: preventing or contributing to the prevention of disease
= synonyms: prophylactic
- tending to prevent or hinder
= synonyms: preventative
noun
- an agent or device intended to prevent conception
= synonyms: preventative, contraceptive, contraceptive device, prophylactic device, birth control device
- any obstruction that impedes or is burdensome
= synonyms: hitch
- remedy that prevents or slows the course of an illness or disease
= synonyms: preventative
